TitMainTitle: Seven men on platform, with name plates inscribed "Mr. Schoyer, Mr. Prattis, Mr. Emmerson, Mr. Tomlinson, Mr. Smith and Mr. Anderson", KDKA and WDUQ microphones, with banners and flags in background and audience in foreground at William Penn Hotel
